comprehensive_overview: The default-environment is a basic system setup that provides essential tools and configurations for software development and computational work. It serves as a starting point for creating custom environments tailored to specific requirements and preferences.
core_features: Includes popular programming languages such as Python, C++, Java, and others
Common utilities like text editors, version control systems, and package managers are pre-installed
Support for compiling code, managing dependencies, and running basic scripts
Can be easily extended and customized with additional software packages and libraries
